GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topic objects

POST /api/topics.description: Serves an object of a posted topic

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all user objects

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves an object of a specifically requested user

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an object with two key-value pairs. The first property is an integer representing the total number of articles with any topic queries applied. The second property is an array of all the articles with any topic queries applied

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles.description: Serves an object of a posted article

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an object of a specifically requested article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an object of a specifically requested article with the vote property updated

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: Deletes the specifically requested article and all the comments that are associated with that article (article_id)

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comment objects for a specifically requested article
